DOC.brief_summary: vaginal PH has an effect on the effectiveness of treatment with misoprostol given vaginally for missed abortions in the first trimester
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Vaginal PH on Treatment Effectiveness With Misoprostol for First Trimester Missed Abortions
DOC.criteria: Inclusion missed abortion under 8 weeks by sac diameter over 18 years old informed concent given missed abortion over 8 weeks hypersensitivity for PG vaginal bleeding suspected EUP IUD heart disease, HTN, cerebral vascular disease, epilepsy intrauterine infection clooting disorder under 18
